How ECHO AI Works

Our intelligent voice AI system transforms customer conversations into actionable insights and automated workflows.

01

Voice Conversation

AI agents engage customers with natural, human-like conversations using advanced speech recognition and synthesis.

Real-time speech processing
Natural language understanding
Emotional tone detection
Multi-language support
02

Data Collection

Intelligently gather customer feedback, preferences, and insights during every conversation.

Structured data capture
Sentiment analysis
Key metrics tracking
Real-time insights
03

Action Triggers

Automatically initiate follow-up actions based on conversation outcomes and customer responses.

Email automation
WhatsApp messaging
CRM updates
Task assignments
04

Analytics & Reporting

Gain deep insights into customer interactions with comprehensive analytics and reporting tools.

Performance dashboards
Customer journey mapping
ROI tracking
Custom reports
95% accuracy rate

Intelligent Conversations

AI that understands context, emotions, and intent for meaningful customer interactions.

< 500ms response time

Real-time Processing

Instant responses and actions with sub-second latency for seamless customer experience.

Unlimited concurrent calls

Scalable Operations

Handle thousands of concurrent conversations without compromising quality or performance.

100% conversation tracking

Complete Visibility
